column4: 劇場版「進撃の巨人」Season2 ～覚醒の咆哮～ 特典CD
Wouldn't it be nice to take a walk on some pure white sand
column5: 倘若能信步漫游于澄沙净砾之上

column8: Wouldn't be sweet to watch the sun curve down meets the waves
column9: 假使能顾视夕曛光弧浮光跃金，如许岂非赏心悦目？
